mapper.insert:
insert into BOARD(NUM, BOARDCODE, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, NOTIFY) values (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{boardCode}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{notify})
select NVL(max(NUM),0) from BOARD
mapper.update: update BOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, BOARDCODE=#{boardCode}, MODDATE=sysdate where NUM=#{num}
update BOARD set HIT=HIT+1 where NUM=#{num}
update BOARD set HEART=HEART+1 where NUM=#{num}
update BOARD set NOTIFY=#{notify} where NUM=#{num}
mapper.select: select NUM, WRITER, TITLE, REGDATE, MODDATE, HIT from (select ROWNUM RNUM, NUM, WRITER, TITLE, REGDATE, MODDATE, HIT from (select * from BOARD order by REGDATE desc, NUM desc) where BOARDCODE=#{boardCode} and NOTIFY='notice')

select NUM, TITLE from (select NUM, TITLE, HEART, HIT, REGDATE from BOARD where REGDATE>=sysdate-7 and BOARDCODE='info' and NOTIFY='no'
order by HEART desc)
order by HIT desc)
where ROWNUM >= 5
select NUM, BOARDCODE, TITLE, REGDATE from BOARD where WRITER=#{nickname} order by REGDATE desc
select WRITER from BOARD where NUM=#{num}
select count(*) from BOARD where BOARDCODE=#{boardCode} and NOTIFY='no'
select count(*) from BOARD where NOTIFY!='no'
